tool_description: Translate & Translator API  : Experience the future of language translation with our AI-Powered Universal Translator API. Harness the cutting-edge capabilities of artificial intelligence to effortlessly translate text between over 100+ languages and dialects. Our advanced AI algorithms ensure unparalleled translation accuracy, making it the ideal solution for applications, websites, and services that demand precision and fluency in multilingual communication.

title: AI Translator API
